S083.Q7. HOW MUCH EDUCATION HAVE YOU HA?  1. LESS THAN 8TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL OR TRADE SCHOOL 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. SOME COLLEGE 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 7. GRADUATE STUDY IN COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q12. HOW DID YOU OBTAIN YOUR COMMISSIO?  1. FROM OFFICER CANDIDATE SCHOOL 2. FROM R.O.T.C. OR C.M.T.C. 3. FROM WEST POINT 4. THROUGH EXTENSION COURSES 5. COMMISSIONED DIRECT FROM ENLISTED STATUS 6. COMMISSIONED DIRECT FROM CIVILIAN LIFE 7. ALL OTHER ANSWERS 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q13. WHAT WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. IN BUSINESS OR PROFESSION FOR MYSELF 2. WORKING AT A PAID JOB 3. GOING TO SCHOOL 4. LOOKING FOR WORK 0. NO ANSWER X. CODES AND DATA NOT PROVIDED FOR Q.14-Q.17.
S083.Q18. HOW MUCH ASSISTANCE IN YOUR JOB DO YOU RECEIVE FROM YOUR SUPERIOR?  1. NONE 2. SOME, BUT NOT ENOUGH 3. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 4. MORE THAN NECESSARY 5. ENTIRELY TOO MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q19. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE SOME GOOD SUGGESTIONS AS TO HOW YOUR JOB OR OTHER THINGS IN YOUR OUTFIT COULD BE DONE BETTER OR EASIE?  1. I HAVE PLENTY OF SUGGESTIONS 2. I HAVE A FEW SUGGESTIONS 3. NOTHING TO SUGGEST 0. NO ANSWER
S083.Q20. HOW EASY DO YOU FEEL IT IS TO GET YOUR SUGGESTIONS CONSIDERED BY THOSE WHO COULD PUT THEM TO US?  1. VERY EASY 2. QUITE EASY 3. NOT VERY EASY 4. VERY DIFFICULT 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S083.Q21. IN GENERAL, DO YOU SPEND MOST OF YOUR TIME ON YOUR JOB DOING ADMINISTRATIVE OR TECHNICAL WOR?  1. ADMINISTRATIVE WORK 2. TECHNICAL WORK 3. COMBINATION OF BOTH 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q26. WOULD YOU TRANSFER TO AN ARMY ASSIGNMENT WHERE YOU COULD USE YOUR SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TRAINING NOT NOW USED, IF THE OPPORTUNITIES FOR PROMOTION WERE THE SAME AS IN YOUR PRESENT ASSIGNMEN?  1. YES, I WOULD TRANSFER 2. NO, I WOULD NOT TRANSFER 3. UNDECIDED ABOUT SUCH TRANSFER 4. I USE MY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TECHNICAL TRAINING ON MY PRESENT ASSIGNMENT 5. I DO NOT HAVE ANY SPECIALIZED CIVILIAN TECHNICAL TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q28. IN YOUR PRESENT ASSIGNMENT HOW MUCH ARE YOU USING THE TRAINING YOU GOT AT THE SPECIALIZED SCHOOL OR COURS?  1. I USE THIS TRAINING ALL THE TIME 2. I USE THIS TRAINING MOST OF THE TIME 3. I USE THIS TRAINING ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 4. I HARDLY EVER USE THIS TRAINING 5. I NEVER USE THIS TRAINING 6. I DID NOT GO TO ANY SPECIALIZED SCHOOL OR COURSE 0. NO ANSWER

NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. I HAVE NO SUCH SPECIALIZED ARMY TRAINING 5. I USE MY SPECIALIZED ARMY TRAINING ON MY PRESENT ASSIGNMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q30. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY AN OFFICER WITH LESS TRAINING THAN YOU HAV?  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY ANOTHER OFFICER WITH LESS TRAINING 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q31. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR WORK COULD BE SATISFACTORILY DONE BY AN OFFICER OF LESS ABILITY THAN YOU HAV?  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY AN OFFICER WITH LESS ABILITY 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q32. DO YOU FEEL THAT ANY OF YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY A WARRANT OFFICE?  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY A WARRANT OFFICER 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q33. DO YOU FEEL THAT ANY OF YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY AN ENLISTED MA?  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY AN ENLISTED MAN 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q34. DO YOU FEEL THAT ANY OF YOUR WORK COULD BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY A CIVILIA?  1. NONE OF IT COULD BE DONE BY A CIVILIAN 2. A LITTLE OF IT COULD 3. MUCH OF IT COULD 4. ALMOST ALL OF IT COULD 5. ALL OF IT COULD 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q35. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE TABLE OF ORGANIZATION AND CUSTOM, DO YOU THINK YOUR WORK WOULD REALLY REQUIRE AN OFFICE?  1. IT REALLY REQUIRES AN OFFICER 2. AN OFFICER WOULD NOT REALLY BE REQUIRED 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q36. COULD YOUR ARMY JOB BE COMBINED WITH THAT OF SOMEONE ELSE AND BE DONE SATISFACTORILY BY HIM AS PART OF HIS JO?  1. SOME OF IT COULD 2. ABOUT HALF OF IT COULD 3. MOST OF IT COULD 4. ALL OF IT COULD 5. NO, NONE 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q37. CONSIDERING YOUR MILITARY AND CIVILIAN BACKGROUND AND TRAINING, HOW DO YOU BELIEVE YOU COULD CONTRIBUTE MOST TO WINNING THE WA?  1. BY HAVING A DIFFERENT ASSIGNMENT IN THE ZONE OF THE INTERIOR 2. BY HAVING AN ASSIGNMENT IN A COMBAT ZONE 3. BY REMAINING ON MY PRESENT ASSIGNMENT 4. AS A CIVILIAN WORKING ON A WAR JOB 5. BOTH 1 AND 2 CODES CHECKED 6. BOTH 2 AND 3 CODES CHECKED 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q38. HOW MUCH WORK HAS THERE USUALLY BEEN TO DO ON YOUR JOB OR ASSIGNMENT DURING THE LAST FEW WEEK?  1. USUALLY MORE THAN ENOUGH TO DO 2. USUALLY ABOUT ENOUGH TO DO FOR A FULL DAY'S WORK 3. USUALLY LESS THAN ENOUGH TO DO 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q39. WOULD YOU TRANSFER TO SOME OTHER ARMY ASSIGNMENT, IF GIVEN A CHANC? (TO WHAT ASSIGNMENT WOULD YOU TRANSFE?)  1. NO 2. UNDECIDED 3. YES, DEPENDING ON THE ASSIGNMENT, AN ASSIGNMENT WRITTEN IN 4. YES, TO ALMOST ANY OTHER ASSIGNMENT 5. YES, NO ASSIGNMENT WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER
S083.Q40. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY ASSIGNMENT WHERE YOU BEST FI?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q41. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY ASSIGNMEN?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. DISSATISFIED 5. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q42. DO YOU THINK YOU COULD HANDLE AN ARMY ASSIGNMENT REQUIRING MORE ABILITY AND EXPERIENCE THAN IS NEEDED IN THE WORK YOU ARE NOW DOIN?  1. I AM SURE I COULD 2. I THINK I COULD 3. I DO NOT KNOW WHETHER I COULD OR NOT 4. I DO NOT THINK I COULD 5. I COULD NOT 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q43. WHEN YOU ARE ON THE JOB, HOW ENTHUSIASTIC DO YOU FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU ARE DOIN?  1. VERY ENTHUSIASTIC 2. ENTHUSIASTIC 3. FAIRLY ENTHUSIASTIC 4. NOT VERY ENTHUSIASTIC 5. NOT AT ALL ENTHUSIASTIC 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q44. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING BEST APPLIES TO YOUR ASSIGNMEN?  1. TIME ALWAYS PASSES QUICKLY 2. TIME USUALLY PASSES QUICKLY 3. SOME HOURS DRAG WHILE OTHERS PASS QUICKLY 4. TIME USUALLY DRAGS 5. TIME ALWAYS DRAGS 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q45. DO YOU THINK YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT GIVES YOU A FAIR CHANCE FOR PROMOTIO?  1. YES 2. NO (NO ANSWER AS TO WHY; UNDECIDED OR DON'T KNOW) 3. NO, BECAUSE OF TABLE OF ORGANIZATION (OR TABLE OF ORGANIZATION AND SOMETHING ELSE MENTIONED) 4. NO, BECAUSE OF FAVORITISM (AND TABLE OF ORGANIZATION IS NOT MENTIONED AT ALL) 0. NO ANSWER
S083.Q46. DO YOU THINK YOUR PRESENT ARMY ASSIGNMENT GIVES YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q47. HOW DOES YOUR PRESENT ARMY GRADE COMPARE WITH THAT OF OFFICERS YOU KNOW WHO HAVE ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT OF COMMISSIONED SERVIC?  1. MY GRADE IS HIGHER THAN THAT OF OTHERS I KNOW 2. MY GRADE IS ABOUT THE SAME AS THAT OF OTHERS I KNOW 3. MY GRADE IS LOWER THAN THAT OF OTHERS I KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S083.Q48. DOES YOUR ARMY JOB KEEP YOU WORKING AT CAPACITY, OR ARE YOU SOMETIMES REQUIRED TO BE PRESENT WHEN THERE IS LITTLE OR NO WORK TO BE DON?  1. I'M REALLY BUSY AT LEAST 8 HOURS A DAY 2. SOMETIMES THERE'S NOT MUCH TO DO 3. OFTEN THERE IS NOT MUCH TO DO 0. NO ANSWER CARD 2
